alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 12:16PM PDT until May 24 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Esmeralda County in south central Nevada... * Until 100 PM PDT. * At 1214 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southeast of Mina, or 18 miles north of Coaldale, moving northeast at 25 mph. This storm was east and north of the Highway 95 corridor. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to some roofs or trees. Periods of blowing dust could occur as well. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Esmeralda County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Las Vegas.
